Content: A group of staff of the Bandaranaike International Airport staged a protest today (Apr. 02) demanding the issues relating to their salary structure to be solved. The protest was held in front of the arrival lounge of the BIA. Authorities have deployed around 1500 from the Air Force and Commando Regiment to beef up the security there. The Secretary of the airport branch of Sri Lanka Nidahas Sevaka Sangamaya, Dinesh Perera said if they do not get a solution in near future, they would resort to a work stoppage (Pix by : Prasad Muthukuda)
